00035 #include <stdio.h>
00036 #include <math.h>

00038 #include <string.h>
00039 #include "gerb_transf.h"
00040 
00041 void gerb_transf_free(gerb_transf_t* transf)
00042 {
00043     free(transf);
00044     
00045 }/*gerb_transf_t*/
00046 
00047 
00048 gerb_transf_t* gerb_transf_new(void)
00049 {
00050     gerb_transf_t *transf;
00051     
00052     transf = malloc(sizeof(gerb_transf_t));
00053     gerb_transf_reset(transf);
00054     return transf;
00055     
00056 
00057 } /*gerb_transf_new*/
00058 
00059 void gerb_transf_reset(gerb_transf_t* transf)
00060 {
00061     memset(transf,0,sizeof(gerb_transf_t));
00062     
00063     transf->r_mat[0][0] = transf->r_mat[1][1] = 1.0; /*off-diagonals 0 diagonals 1 */
00064     transf->r_mat[1][0] = transf->r_mat[0][1] = 0.0;
00065     transf->scale = 1.0;
00066     transf->offset[0] = transf->offset[1] = 0.0;
00067     
00068 } /*gerb_transf_reset*/
00069 
00071 
00075 void gerb_transf_rotate(gerb_transf_t* transf, double angle)
00076 {
00077     double m[2][2]; 
00078     double s = sin(angle), c = cos(angle);
00079       
00080     memcpy(m, transf->r_mat, sizeof(m));    
00081     transf->r_mat[0][0] = c * m[0][0] - s * m[1][0];
00082     transf->r_mat[0][1] = c * m[0][1] - s * m[1][1];
00083     transf->r_mat[1][0] = s * m[0][0] + c * m[1][0];
00084     transf->r_mat[1][1] = s * m[0][1] + c * m[1][1];
00085 //    transf->offset[0] = transf->offset[1] = 0.0; CHECK ME
00086     
00087 } /*gerb_transf_rotate*/
00088 
00090 
00095 void gerb_transf_shift(gerb_transf_t* transf, double shift_x, double shift_y)
00096 {
00097       
00098     transf->offset[0] += shift_x;
00099     transf->offset[1] += shift_y;
00100             
00101 } /*gerb_transf_shift*/
00102 
00103 void gerb_transf_apply(double x, double y, gerb_transf_t* transf, double *out_x, double *out_y)
00104 {
00105 
00106 //    x += transf->offset[0];
00107 //    y += transf->offset[1];
00108     *out_x = (x * transf->r_mat[0][0] + y * transf->r_mat[0][1]) * transf->scale;
00109     *out_y = (x * transf->r_mat[1][0] + y * transf->r_mat[1][1]) * transf->scale;
00110     *out_x += transf->offset[0];
00111     *out_y += transf->offset[1];
00112     
00113     
00114 }/*gerb_transf_apply*/
